backend/main.mo: Actor exposing a simple healthCheck endpoint returning a healthy status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing enforced fixed DA logic and Tamil Nadu Hotel Rule updates with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files including styling, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining steps, verification, and troubleshooting for releasing the Salary Split Calculator app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH tokens and enforcing white backgrounds in light mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint configuring metadata, title, and root mounting point for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling the header, salary calculator, final salary workflow, and footer.
frontend/src/components/salary/FinalSala: Final salary calculator workflow handling employee inputs, deductions, summaries, and message sharing.
frontend/src/components/salary/SalarySpl: Main salary split UI with zone selection, manual vs TN Hotel Rule modes, fixed DA handling, and component breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/salary/TamilNadu: UI component for configuring Tamil Nadu hotel salary rules, handling basic percentage input and designation-based autofill. Computes basic and other percentage values using fixed DA and gross amounts.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with company details, feature highlights, and commitment statements. Displays a grid of feature cards and informational text blocks.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact information including phone, address, and hours, plus a call-to-action for placing orders. Includes clickable phone links and a structured contact info grid.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with introductory text, call and contact buttons, and a scroll-to-contact handler. Highlights the company's location and core offering.
frontend/src/components/sections/Machine: Shows a grid of machinery items with images, titles, and descriptions used in processing. Highlights two main machines with supporting visuals.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Outlines processing steps and capabilities, then displays the machinery block. Features a step-by-step grid and a capabilities list.
frontend/src/components/sections/Product: Lists processed husk products with descriptions and applications, plus a pricing contact CTA. Renders a grid of product cards with icons and details.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Fixed header displaying the app title and calculator icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFinalSalary.ts: Manages salary form state, validates inputs, computes final salary, and stores finalized employee entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalarySplit.ts: Handles zone‑based salary split logic, auto‑fill rules, and calculation modes for salary components.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with an OKLCH color palette.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports the app’s contact phone number in display and dialable formats.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides helpers to format numbers and currency values using Indian locale rules.
frontend/src/lib/finalSalaryMessage.ts: Generates formatted salary statements and creates WhatsApp and SMS deep links for employee salary messages.
frontend/src/lib/hotelDesignations.ts: Exports a comprehensive list of hotel industry job designations and its type definition.
frontend/src/lib/zoneDesignationBasicCon: Defines basic salary configuration per hotel designation and zone, including default values and fixed DA logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, and pending requests related to enforcing DA as a fixed amount.
